title: Galaxy Generator
intro: Real-time GPU starfield with per-star color and twinkle, clean GLSL files, and performance guards.
problem: Deliver an immersive starfield background that stays smooth on mid-range laptops and is easy to iterate on.
solution: Per-star attributes (scale, color, phase) in a single ShaderMaterial for variety and twinkle.
External GLSL in /public/shaders (fetched at runtime) to avoid bundler loaders and keep shaders tidy.
Performance guards: DPR cap, pause render when tab hidden, isolated stacking context under the hero.
results: ~60 FPS on desktop, ~30 FPS on typical mobile hardware.
No GPU leaks across route changes (proper dispose/cleanup).
